title: Baggage claim receipts and delayed baggage reports
dataVerified: Passenger name, baggage tag numbers, flight details, claim amount, airline
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Claim status (approved/settled/denied). Link to airline baggage system (passenger and claims, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents altered baggage claim amounts. Domain binding verifies airline. Montreal Convention liability limits. Prevents inflated claim fraud. Baggage delay compensation documentation (EU261 regulation).
